TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Exec extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension

summary.span: 实现 Exec 任务。

span.span: Implements the Exec task.

summary.span: 使用项目文件中的 Exec 元素创建和执行此任务。

span.span: Use the Exec element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅 [Exec 任务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c9b7525a-b1c9-40fc-8bce-77a5b8f960d8)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [Exec Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c9b7525a-b1c9-40fc-8bce-77a5b8f960d8).

summary.span: 生成命令行工具必须直接从命令行而不是从响应文件运行的命令行参数。

span.span: Generates command line arguments that the command line tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Command { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要执行的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command to run.
The command to run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要运行的命令可以是一个系统命令，如 attrib 或可执行文件，如 program.exe。The command to run can be a system command, such as attrib, or an executable, such as program.exe.

summary.span: 将输出作为项返回。

span.span: Returns the output as an Item.

summary.span: 空白已删除。

span.span: Whitespace is trimmed.

summary.span: 当 ConsoleToMSBuild 为真时，启用 ConsoleOutput。

span.span: ConsoleOutput is enabled when ConsoleToMSBuild is true.

summary.span: 如果没有使用，则避免在内存中保存线。

span.span: This avoids holding lines in memory if they aren't used.

summary.span: ConsoleOutput 为 stdout 和 stderr 的组合。

span.span: ConsoleOutput is a combination of stdout and stderr.
Returns .

value.span: 用于找出工具输出中的错误行的正则表达式。

span.span: A regular expression to spot error lines in the tool output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于生成不常见格式的输出的工具。This property is useful for tools that produce unusually formatted output.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override int ExecuteTool (string pathToTool, string responseFileCommands, string commandLineCommands);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance int32 ExecuteTool(string pathToTool, string responseFileCommands, string commandLineCommands) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ExecuteTool (pathToTool As String, responseFileCommands As String, commandLineCommands As String) As Integer
protected: override int ExecuteTool(System::String ^ pathToTool, System::String ^ responseFileCommands, System::String ^ commandLineCommands);

span.span: The path to the tool to execute.

param.name: responseFileCommands
param.span: 应存入临时响应文件的命令行参数。

span.span: Command line arguments that should go into a temporary response file.

param.name: commandLineCommands
param.span: 应直接传递到工具的命令行参数。

span.span: Command line arguments that should be passed to the tool directly.

summary.span: 执行 cmd.exe 工具，等待它完成，然后在完成执行后清理批处理文件。

span.span: Executes the cmd.exe tool, waits for its completion, and cleans up the batch file after execution completes.

returns.span: 工具所返回的退出代码。

span.span: The exit code that the tool returns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果记录错误，并且该工具具有的退出代码为零，则此方法设置的退出代码为-1。If errors were logged and the tool has an exit code of zero, then this method sets the exit code to -1.

summary.span: 返回要用于工具处理的工作目录。

span.span: Returns the working directory to use for the tool process.

returns.span: 要用于工具处理的工作目录。

span.span: The working directory to use for the tool process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作目录是 UNC，返回的系统路径 %systemroot%\system32。If the working directory is UNC, returns the system path %SystemRoot%\System32.

Protected Overrides Function HandleTaskExecutionErrors () As Boolean

summary.span: 记录错误消息和处理退出代码。

span.span: Logs error message and handles exit code.

returns.span: 如果退出代码被忽略，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if exit code was ignored; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅将以非零退出代码调用此方法。This method will only be called with a non-zero exit code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IgnoreExitCode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示在执行命令返回非零的退出代码 () 时，Exec 任务应忽略执行命令 () 所提供的退出代码，还是应返回 。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the Exec task should ignore the exit code provided by the executed command () or should return if the executed command returns a non-zero exit code ().

value.span: 如果Exec任务应忽略执行命令; 提供的退出代码如果Exec任务应返回如果在执行的命令返回非零的退出代码。

span.span: if the Exec task should ignore the exit code provided by the executed command; if the Exec task should return if the executed command returns a non-zero exit code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IgnoreStandardErrorWarningFormat { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否忽略标准错误和警告格式并将输出中的错误和警告记录为常规消息的布尔值。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to ignore the standard error and warning format and log errors and warnings from the output as regular messages.

value.span: 如果Exec任务应忽略的标准错误和警告格式，并应记录错误和警告作为常规消息;如果Exec任务应记录错误和警告的标准错误和警告格式相匹配。

span.span: if the Exec task should ignore the standard error and warning format and should log errors and warnings as regular messages; if the Exec task should log the errors and warnings that match the standard error and warning format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LogEventsFromTextOutput (string singleLine, Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LogEventsFromTextOutput(string singleLine, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance) cil managed
protected: override void LogEventsFromTextOutput(System::String ^ singleLine, Microsoft::Build::Framework::MessageImportance messageImportance);

span.span: Single line from the output to parse.

param.name: messageImportance
param.span: 关于记录消息的重要性。

span.span: The importance to log the message with.

summary.span: 如果指定的一行文本与自定义或标准的错误和警告格式匹配，则将这行文本记录为错误或警告；如果 设置为 且没有匹配的自定义格式，则记录为常规消息。

span.span: Logs the specified single line of text as an error or warning if the single line matched custom or standard error and warning formats or as a regular message if is set to and no custom format matched.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ Outputs { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置任务的输出项。

span.span: Gets or sets the output items from the task.
The output items from the task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Exec`任务不会设置输出项。The `Exec` task does not set the output items. 相反，你可以提供的输出项就像它们已设置的任务，以便可以更高版本在项目中使用它们。Instead, you can provide the output items as if they were set by the task, so that they can be used later in the project.
